channel.title: I don't understand
channel.description:
Ok when you are Starting your own server, I don't understand when it says download a source/base. When I download one and I set it up i want to make a server for MOPARSCAPE, not for another client. Why can't i just make a server for moparscape?
I must be doing something wrong here lol. When you actually make the server then can you use it on moparscape aswell or something?

item.title: I don't understand
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The problem with using moparscape client with the server downloads here is because moparscape client has the basic 317 data, while the 317 servers we have now has some 508 interfaces programmed into them and custom item id’s giving them the reason for a custom client. Remove all of these and it will work properly.

Read full topic
